name: AASHISH FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Aashish Foundation is a trust which aims to provide best practice in the assessment and management of individuals    having developmental challenges. The foundation runs two Centres offering Occupational Therapy services; located at Prabhadevi and Navi Mumbai. Since the inception of the centres in 2008. the foundation has served around 500 families. Our future plan is to develop a custodial care home for our clients.
